store_listing.short_description: AI-powered IELTS assessment with official band-aligned feedback
store_listing.full_description:
IELTS GenAI Prep is the only AI-powered IELTS assessment platform with official band-aligned feedback. Get instant, accurate scoring using TrueScore® writing assessment and ClearScore® speaking assessment with Maya AI examiner.

Key Features:
• TrueScore® AI Writing Assessment with official IELTS rubric alignment
• ClearScore® AI Speaking Assessment with Maya AI examiner
• Cross-platform access - use on mobile and desktop
• Authentic feedback matching official IELTS marking criteria
• $36.49 USD for 4 comprehensive assessments per type

Perfect for Academic and General Training IELTS preparation with AI technology that understands official band descriptors.
